description:
It`s Heaven`s Game where your life is on the line! Natsu faces off against the birdbrained "Warrior of Justice" Fukurou, while Lucy and Juvia battle the punk hair-flinging rocker Vidaldus Taka! They might seem silly, but as members of the Assassin`s Guild they mean serious business! Faced with such odd forms of magic, the battles take an unexpected turn! Can Natsu and the others find the light of hope that can free Erza from her past while a strike from Etherion looms?
Source: crunchyroll
